name: Whitepink Concoction
description: +ACI-A white potion with pink bubbles. It rattles on the table
column7: as if about to set into a gallop.+ACI-

name: Eight Eye Potion
description: A black potion filled with eight newt eyes. A dark smoke rises from the surface.

name: Groundboiler Brew
description: A rough brown potion that rumbles in place. Bits bubble over and drip off the side.

name: Growing Potion
description: A dark green potion in which bits of saturated dirt float. The wood around it is sprouting leaves.

name: Lovely White Draught
description: +ACI-A frosty white+AC0-blue potion. Small slivers of ice float around inside
